title: Special interest groups in Pennsylvania funding ads targeting state Supreme Court candidates
text: It was nice while it lasted â€” the time when Pennsylvania Supreme Court candidates merely advertised themselves. But now, outside money is wading in, starting with negative TV ads targeting Republicans seeking the court's three open seats. According to ads by the group "Pennsylvanians for Judicial... ...
